rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment provides factual information about scale without employing Q2 cues.
The segment reports factual information but contains no explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser + scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports factual data (case size/ranking), not capabilities or preparedness.
Reports numerical metric ('more than 2.7 million chickens') using standard verbs ('was').
